author: potuz
content: <@&688090867927482525> can't get confirmation that you guys are online in your discord, could you please take a look at this issue https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/28134#issuecomment-1722466572 ? This bug will prevent any block produced by prysm. Other clients disregard geth if they are using mev boost, but even builders using prysm wouldn't be able to produce blocks.
